name: Niggurath, the Shepherd
text:
Limit 1When this card enters your field or whenever it attacks ⇒ Search your deck for a card named "Gentle Goat", and put it into your field. Then shuffle your deck.
Banish a Goat: Put two limit counters on this card.
At the end of turn ⇒ If there are no limit counters on this card, return it to its owner's hand.
